attributes.review: I came to this app to get some confirmation that my president is a good person. And now I only just realize that he’s an awful one. I voted for him last time but now I’m gonna make sure to vote blue to get this baffling baboon out of office. I hope anyone else would do the same.
attributes.title: I really can’t vote for him again

attributes.review: Okay so when I tried to download the app it took 3 hours👹and when it was done downloading I opened the app to find a disturbing picture🤢🤮 that gave me nightmares for 3 weeks and I had to go to therapy it was so bad I couldn’t even look at a orange for weeks✨🧚🏽 please don’t download the app it’s for your own good

If I could, I'd rate this app zero stars. As soon as i downloaded it, my phone started experiencing problems and the app wouldn't even open without crashing. I wanted to stay informed on President Trump's upcoming events but this app just won't work :( don't download it, you'll just be disappointed
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app almost deleted everything in my phone and my contacts just because I’m Mexican idk how that happened just be sure u don’t get this app and my phone started to get so hot it felt like a oven or a stove so pls don’t get this app so I think they should delete this app I warned u don’t download it
attributes.title: Worst app in America

attributes.review: This app is terrible and it made my phone glitch out like crazy. The software is a danger to everyone’s phone. Also whenever I tried going to the app a terrifying picture of an orange man kept popping up and made my cousin faint from fear. This app will ruin lives. Take it down !
attributes.title: Terrible app, do not download !!

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app for the intention to find at least on good quality in our president Cheeto, but none was found. I should’ve listened to my family and not waste my time on this so called president!! 

Not only that, but the app functioned so terrible. It was awful. Just like our president.
attributes.title: Worst app In history

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to check it out and I’m pretty sure my phone has a virus now. Do not download this app and if you go, don’t allow it to send you notifications. I got spammed constantly with them, they were going off in the middle of the night causing me to get lack of sleep.
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever been on and no one should be using it. Took 3 weeks to download and glitches it even shut down my phone once! When the app was working it had terrible information and made me want to puke just looking at it. Do not download!!!!
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app has taken up so much storage on my phone. It makes my phone super glitchy. And the fact that I have an iPhone 11 Pro really says a lot. I downloaded the app when I first got the phone and it completely shut down my phone after I downloaded it. 🤦🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: Too Much!!

attributes.review: Honestly I just downloaded this to see who would actually vote for trump. He’s a racist orange. He’s disgusting and he likes his kids sexually more than his wife. He’s gross. He should not be voted 2020. Although you people should not vote for Kanye West, anyways, Biden is our only choice he may not be the best but it’s the only choice!! Please review this app terribly.
attributes.title: Trump
